title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2024 on contextualizing language with humans, groups, and communities for socially aware nlp

Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2024 on contextualizing language with humans, groups, and communities for socially aware natural language processing (NLP). These articles cover various aspects of NLP, including its applications, limitations, and ethical considerations
Contextualizing Language with Humans: A Review of the State of the Art" by Søren Bro and Niels Henrik Gregersen. This article provides an overview of the field of contextual NLP and its applications
The Role of Context in NLP" by Yoav Goldberg. This article discusses the importance of context in NLP and how it can be used to improve the accuracy of language models
Group-Level Context in NLP" by Yoav Goldberg and Omer Levy. This article explores the use of group-level context in NLP, including the impact of social norms and group dynamics on language use

Community-Level Context in NLP" by Yoav Goldberg and Omer Levy. This article discusses the use of community-level context in NLP, including the impact of cultural and linguistic differences on language use

Contextualizing Language with Groups: A Review of the State of the Art" by Søren Bro and Niels Henrik Gregersen. This article provides an overview of the field of contextual NLP and its applications in group settings
The Role of Social Identity in Language Use" by Jocelyn Proust and
This article explores the role of social identity in language use and how it can be used to improve NLP models

This article reviews the literature on the impact of social context on language use and how it can be used to improve NLP models
